svg.text: This example compares uncoded transmission of a binary signal through a channel that introduces random errors to transmission with an error-correcting code. The total number of errors in each case and error rate are displayed in the icons below. The ViterbiDecoder actor does hard decoding.
To run this demo, click on the red triangle in the toolbar.
Authors: Rachel Zhou and Edward A. Lee

entity.name: Bernoulli
entity.doc: Create a sequence of bernoulli random variables

svg.text: Count errors and produce both the total number of errors and the error rate.

entity.name: Ramp
entity.doc: Create a sequence of tokens with increasing value

svg.text: Count errors and produce both the total number of errors and the error rate.
